name: Curving Havoc
description:
Boomerangs are straightforward. You throw them, and then try to catch them. When push comes to shove, most could figure out its tendencies and adjust the power and angle of the throw to get the correct outcome. But you can throw all that common sense out the window, as it won't help you.

You better be ready for a Boomerang that seemingly has a mind of its own and is clearly out to get you!

Also, there is a slight underlying story beneath all the madness. Make of it what you will :)

P.S. This gif is just the tutorial

Controls (Keyboard & Mouse)

[Buttons in parenthesis are alternate options]

WASD (Arrow Keys) – Move

L-Shift (Space) – Slide

L-Mouse (R-Mouse) [Charge] – Throw, hold for more power

Mouse – Aim

 

Controls (Controller) *Better Experience*

[Only tested on Xbox, but should work on PS4]

L-Joystick – Move

L-Trigger (L-Bumper) – Slide

R-Trigger (R-Bumper) [Charge] – Throw, hold for more power

R-Joystick – Aim

Controls are also available in the pause menu in-game, accessed via 'escape' or the 'start button' on the controller.

Good luck!

Feel free to post a comment if you beat it. The last level is pretty brutal :)
